university.name: Università degli Studi di Bologna (Alma Mater Studiorum)
university.notes: Oldest university in Western world (founded 1088). 252 degree programs: 101 triennale, 137 magistrale, 14 ciclo unico. 96 international programs (79 in English). 31 departments, 5 schools, 5 campuses.

programs.program_name: Ingegneria per l'Ambiente e il Territorio
programs.program_name_it: Ingegneria per l'Ambiente e il Territorio

programs.notes: NEW 2025 - First international veterinary medicine program

programs.program_name: DAMS - Discipline delle Arti, della Musica e dello Spettacolo

tests_required.notes: Required for many programs (TOLC-I, TOLC-E, TOLC-S, etc.)

admissions.notes: Access varies by program: open access, local programmato, national programmato. TOLC tests via CISIA.

scholarships.notes: Regional scholarship from Emilia-Romagna. Includes tuition waiver, accommodation, meals. Apply through ER.GO portal.

scholarships.scholarship_name: Unibo Action 1 - Study Grants for International Students

eligibility.other_criteria: Admitted to master programs, high academic achievement

scholarships.notes: Full tuition waiver plus EUR 11,000 living allowance
Full or partial tuition waiver based on merit
